Authors: Li-jie Guo, yuyan xu, Li Fan
Title:
Geopora sinensis, a new truffle species from North China
based on morphological and molecular data
Keywords:
Key words: ITS, Pezizales, taxonomy, phylogeny, hypogeous
fungi
Abstract:
Geopora sinensis sp. nov. was described and illustrated
from North China based on molecular and morphological analyses in this
paper. Morphologically G. sinensis is similar to G. cooperi, G. gilkeyae
and G. tolucana, but distinguished from them by the combination of
broadly ellipsoid ascospores and white hymenium. ITS-based phylogenetic
analysis supports the erection of the new species.
